name: Car Legends
description:
Spin, Merge and Race! Do you want to be a car legend?

***Spin to earn coins and hit the jackpot***
Spin the wheel to collect coins, thief, diamonds, racing cars, police vehicle and every fabulous jackpot.
Steal cars from other players to help you build race motorcade.
Win the big jackpot reward by your fortune.
Use police vehicle to protect your cars.
Become the best looter and dominate the city race.

***Merge the amazing cars***
Merge cars to upgrade and complete the race.
There are 40 kinds of cars in the game. Some gorgeous cars are waiting for you to collect.
You can keep the race progress when you are offline. Earn the mileage once you launch the game.

***Finish the race progress by your cars***
There are 35 cities’ races.
The more cities you are done, the more reward you loot.
Collect the mysterious car when you reach on certain of cities.

Building your own racing motorcade and be a legend！

Other things you need to know:
